words.hint: An electronic device for storing and processing data
A person trained to travel in a spacecraft
A large natural elevation of the earth's surface
A tall plant of the daisy family, with a large golden-rayed flower
A large oval or roundish fruit with a hard green rind and sweet watery red or occasionally yellowish pulp
An optical instrument used for viewing very small objects
A place where people pay to sit and eat meals that are cooked and served on the premises
A type of aircraft that derives both lift and propulsion from one or more sets of horizontally revolving overhead rotors
A book or electronic resource that lists the words of a language and gives their meaning
